2. Departments

Departments
===========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Administration](https://westlakehills.org/94/Administration)

   View city budgets and financial information.
2. #### [Building & Development](https://westlakehills.org/95/Building-Development)

   Apply for building permits and site inspections.
3. #### [City Secretary](https://westlakehills.org/280/City-Secretary)

   Information on Agendas, Minutes, Commission, Code of Ordinances, Elections and Public Information
4. #### [Elections](https://www.westlakehills.org/283/Elections)
5. #### [Finance](https://westlakehills.org/195/Finance)
6. #### [Human Resources](https://westlakehills.org/291/Human-Resources)

   Job Openings and other HR related information
7. #### [Mayor & City Council](https://westlakehills.org/108/Mayor-City-Council)

   Meet the mayor and City Council members.
8. #### [Municipal Court](https://westlakehills.org/96/Municipal-Court)

   Make court payments online.
9. #### [Open Records / Public Information](https://westlakehills.org/315/Open-Records-Public-Information)
10. #### [Police](https://westlakehills.org/356/Police)

    Contact the Police Department.
11. #### [Public Works](https://westlakehills.org/395/Public-Works)
12. #### [Septic Systems (OSSF)](https://westlakehills.org/382/Septic-Systems-OSSF)
13. #### [Tree & Vegetation Removal](https://westlakehills.org/266/Tree-Vegetation-Removal)
14. #### [Wastewater](https://westlakehills.org/98/Wastewater)

    Obtain wastewater services.
